about_the_game:
「Synapse」 is a game based on cooperative play with horror and thrills.

Players must operate together to evade robots, hack into facilities, and escape in a darkened space.
Each player has several tools with unique functions, which they use to gather information, lure robots, and progress through the game.
This creates an atmosphere of fear and tension, emphasizing strategic decisions and teamwork using the tools.

Universe

In the year 2052, ‘Minerva’, a super-giant artificial intelligence, was born and brought immense prosperity to humanity, quickly becoming an indispensable part of the world's technology.
Then, one day, the “Minerva Shock” occurred, shutting down Minervas around the world, and all contact with the advanced city of ‘Pantheon’, where Minerva's core is located, was cut off.
Players are sent to the high-tech city of ‘Pantheon’ as part of an investigation team and soon find themselves in a terrifying situation.

Sci-Fi Horror

In the universe of 「Synapse」, players face artificial intelligence that can control and monitor facilities.
Made of steel and mechanical parts, they are impervious to most weapons, and they observe and monitor your every move throughout the facility.
The only thing players are given is a sense of helplessness and fear of death.

Exploration and strategy

Each player has several tools with unique functions.
These tools can collect information about the robots, such as their location and status, make noise to guide them, sometimes restrict their vision, or defend against attacks.
Players must use these tools appropriately to survive and escape based on the characteristics of the different robots and the situation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500K or equivalent AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 1060 ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790K or equivalent AMD processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® RTX 2060 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
